settings.name: repoURL
settings.viewName: repo Url for code to be build

settings.name: workingDir
settings.viewName: Local Directory path where build project <workingDir>/<repoName>/<projectName> will be created

settings.name: repoName
settings.viewName: repoName where build project path <workingDir>/<repoName>/<projectName> will be created

settings.name: projectName
settings.viewName: projectName where build project path <workingDir>/<repoName>/<projectName> will be created

params.name: PARAMETERS
params.description: Pass a key-value code object of parameters. For example {param1: 'paramValue'}
